metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0265 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The redirect_stderr function in xnbd_common.c in xnbd-server andxndb-wrapper in xNBD 0.1.0 allow local users to overwrite arbitrary filesvia a symlink attack on /tmp/xnbd.log.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xnbd-client - 0.3.0-1ubuntu1
xnbd-common - 0.3.0-1ubuntu1
xnbd-server - 0.3.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xnbd package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.0-1ubuntu1').
